input_text:
Job Title: Enterprise Account Executive

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
*Candidate must be located in one of the following states : ND, SD, NE, KS, MN, IA, MO, WI, IL, KY, MI, IN, OH
About UsHaving recently secured $103 Million Series C funding from global investors, Connex One has recently been ranked one of the top 15 fastest growing tech companies for the 5th consecutive year. Connex One is a market leading “Omnichannel'' provider, providing powerful in-house AI technology to intelligently transcribe, assess and score calls, with an ever expanding platform of communication channels, including Email, Livechat, Whatsapp, SMS and Facebook.Established in 2013 Connex One is now present in a variety of continents and markets. We serve our customers with a fast growing team of over 450+ based in our offices in USA, England, South Africa, Kenya, Nigeria, Spain, Australia and now our new office in Sweden.We are currently recruiting for a number of live roles and would love to hear from experienced CCaaS individuals who want to further their career within a well-established and fast paced business.What we do, Customer EngagementWe live in a very modern and advanced world where businesses are adapting to the ways customers prefer to interact or communicate with them. Whether it is over the phone, livechat, text messaging or social media, our system will help businesses adapt to their customer’s preferences and cater to their needs. It is Omnichannel Customer Engagement made simple. Role Objective The Enterprise Account Executive role is a key component of the Connex One sales team. The Enterprise Account Executive focuses on developing and implementing account strategies resulting in client acquisition and revenue growth. Working closely within your team with a hunter’s mentality to achieve sales targets. You will work closely with your Sales Director as part of the Connex team.
Main ResponsibilitiesDay to day management of your own calendar and your dedicated Business Development Executives.Meet and exceed sales quota.Define, develop and manage relationships with key individuals in the customer base and ensure the relationship with contacts are maintained at all levels.Prospect into the C-Level on the Business and IT side.Develop and implement account strategies that deliver on the sales objectives.Actively contribute information relating to sales and prospecting activities through regular feedback and sales and operational meetings.Continuous participation in Connex One product updates and sales training.Responsible for developing customer presentations and pricing proposals.Makes sales calls to new and existing customers.Monitor and report on sales activities for Executive and Management teams.Regularly update forecasts and Salesforce
Qualifications5+ years of SaaS/High-Tech sales, deal closing experience with a preference in CX or CCaaS industryKnowledge of the CCaaS enterprise marketTrack record of success driving revenue growth and increasing profitabilityExperience and understanding of sales strategies and methodologies, preference towards Customer Centric Selling and MEDDICEnthusiastic about generating pipeline developmentExperience using Salesforce as CRMArticulate, well spoken with excellent presentation skills

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Enterprise Account Executive
output_json.summary: Key component of the Connex One sales team focusing on client acquisition and revenue growth.
job_responsibilities: Day to day management of own calendar and dedicated Business Development Executives.
Define, develop and manage relationships with key individuals in the customer base.
Ensure the relationship with contacts are maintained at all levels.
Prospect into the C-Level on the Business and IT side.
Develop and implement account strategies that deliver on sales objectives.
Actively contribute information relating to sales and prospecting activities.
Continuous participation in Connex One product updates and sales training.
Responsible for developing customer presentations and pricing proposals.
Make sales calls to new and existing customers.
Monitor and report on sales activities for Executive and Management teams.
output_json.company_information: Connex One is a market leading ‘Omnichannel’ provider, providing powerful in-house AI technology to intelligently transcribe, assess and score calls, with an ever expanding platform of communication channels.
